name: Golden Ray
description:
Survive a vile place where all kinds of hostile enemy forces try to take the life of two honorable knights. Does this spell disaster for these two brave souls or is there a fighting chance?

                                          

By projecting their power of friendship these two fighters form a bond that disintegrates their foes.

I N S T R U C T I O N S:

-W/A/S/D/ or Arrow keys to move 

-"Space" to dash 

-"Escape" to bring up the pause menu

T I P S  &  T R I C K S

-Both players can pick up a powerup if they do it at the same time. Each one gets the benefits. 

The game is still in early access. If there is enough interest/downloads I will keep updating the game with new characters, enemy types, and powerups.

A S S E T S

-Ninja Adventure Asset Pack

-UI pixelart Assets 4
